body:
Hey guys, for those of you remember me, it's Frustration/kammy878. It's been a while since my last AMA, so I decided to make a new one. You know how it goes, Ask me almost anything. Just use your judgement to decide weather your question is appropriate or relevant :D
Anyways, ask away!

~Kam
body_tagged:
Hey guys, for those of you remember me, it's Frustration/kammy878. It's been a while since my last AMA, so I decided to make a new one. You know how it goes, Ask me almost anything. Just use your judgement to decide weather your question is appropriate or relevant :D

title: It's Kammeh! AMAA :D

replies.body:
Favorite place to visit?
Favorite cake flavor? 
Ayyy kammy <3
replies.body_tagged:
Favorite place to visit?
Favorite cake flavor? 
Ayyy kammy <3

replies.body: Where did you go for so long?
replies.body_tagged: Where did you go for so long?

replies.body:
@Eako - I like to visit new places, as I don't feel I've seen enough to decide my favorite yet. And for cakes, I like something fruity ;)
@Snowlas- my favorite color is either green or purple but I like all colors :) And yes petals am a roast God, I'm surprised that you even had to ask that question. :P
@Jamious - probably basketball cuz I have the hoop skillzz :c
@Blaze - I've been right here, I did come on, but In wierd time patterns because I never knew when I'd be free. *cough cough* school Suxx, and before that I went on leave for summer vaca because I went overseas. 
@Oscar -  I honestly wouldn't be able to tell you one, I keep shifting genres and like all of them a lot. I'm indecisive :c
